markdownRemark.html:
BOJ 9207 페그 솔리테어

#include <stdio.h>
#include <queue>
#include <utility>
using namespace std;

char board[6][10];
char cp[6][10];
int dx[] = {0, -1, 0, 1};
int dy[] = {-1, 0, 1, 0};
int p_num = 2147483647, origin_p;

void dfs(int x, int y){
    int ax, ay, i, j, k, p = 0;
    
    for(i = 0; i < 4; i++){
        ax = x + dx[i];
        ay = y + dy[i];
        
        if(ax >= 0 && ax < 5 && ay >= 0 && ay < 9 && cp[ax][ay] == 'o'){
            if(ax + dx[i] >= 0 && ax + dx[i] < 5 && ay + dy[i] >= 0 && ay + dy[i] < 9
               && cp[ax + dx[i]][ay + dy[i]] == '.'){
                cp[ax+dx[i]][ay+dy[i]] = 'o';
                cp[x][y] = '.';
                cp[ax][ay] = '.';
                
                for(j = 0; j < 5; j++){
                    for(k = 0; k < 9; k++){
                        if(cp[j][k] == 'o'){
                            dfs(j, k);
                        }
                    }
                }
                
                cp[ax+dx[i]][ay+dy[i]] = '.';
                cp[x][y] = 'o';
                cp[ax][ay] = 'o';
                
            }
            
        }
    }

    for(j = 0; j < 5; j++){
        for(k = 0; k < 9; k++){
            if(cp[j][k] == 'o'){
                p++;
            }
        }
    }
    
    p_num = p_num < p ? p_num : p;
    
}



void selectPin(queue<pair<int, int>> pin){
    int i, j;
    while(!pin.empty()){
        dfs(pin.front().first, pin.front().second);
        
        for(i = 0; i < 5; i++){
            for(j = 0; j < 9; j++){
                cp[i][j] = board[i][j];
            }
        }
        
        pin.pop();
    }
}

int main(int argc, const char * argv[]) {
    int n, i, j;
    queue<pair<int, int>> ret;
    
    scanf("%d", &n);
    
    while(n--){
        queue<pair<int, int>> pin;
        p_num = 2147483647;

        for(i = 0; i < 5; i++){
            scanf("%s", board[i]);
        }
        
        for(i = 0; i < 5; i++){
            for(j = 0; j < 9; j++){
                cp[i][j] = board[i][j];
                if(board[i][j] == 'o'){
                    pin.push(pair<int, int>(i, j));
                }
            }
        }
        
        origin_p = (int)pin.size();
        
        selectPin(pin);
        
        ret.push(pair<int, int>(p_num, origin_p-p_num));
    }
    
    while(!ret.empty()){
        printf("%d %d\n", ret.front().first, ret.front().second);
        ret.pop();
    }
    
    return 0;
}
